caption.text:
Excited to share ‚ÄúExtending Reality‚Äù, our newest study in xR media. This project demonstrates a truly generative workflow, with 100% of screen content being generated and composited in camera. Using a combination of @stypec camera tracking, @blacktrax object tracking, @disguise media servers, and @notchvfx for real-time graphics generation, we were able to push into new territories of film making and minimize the need for a post-fx workflow.
-
Thanks again to all the teams who made it all possible, this is truly a collaborative project where the final project is bigger than the sum of its parts.
